title: IS IT NEARLY TIME FOR CHALLENGER AHRI YET CMON PLS :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D

replies.body: What? Thought Challenger Ahri had already been released?
As in to be re-released for sale.
Thanks. I'll look into getting her as I main Ahri, but didn't get the chance to buy the skin.
I do as well! But lately I haven't been performing as well on her as usual and am playing other stuff now. But yeah I'm the same, I got into Ahri AFTER Challenger Ahri was up for sale.

I mained her all through Season 4, but took a break due to school etc, but now I'm back and have been promoted twice and now maining her again, she's really strong, especially at lower levels because people don't know how to deal with her. You basically get full lane control after 1 or 2 kills and by late game you're unstoppable.

{{champion:103}} ftw!
Best of both worlds! Can be an assassin and a teamfighting mage! Yay! Literally the most versatile mid laner in the game but lately my skillshots with her have been 0/10
I like playing her as an assassin. Warding their jungle and waiting in a bush to land e+q to deal half their hp is so fun. Then they rage when they die. Priceless.
It is SO fun. Only when you're ahead though.
